predicate.note: Frames file for 'enlist' based on sentences in wsj and automatic expansion via verbnet.

roleset.name: sign up to do something

example.name: arg2 subsumed into arg1
example.text: Back in the chase car, we drove around some more, got stuck in a ditch, enlisted the aid of a local farmer to get out the trailer hitch and pull us out of the ditch.
example.arg: the aid of a local farmer to get out the trailer hitch and pull us out of the ditch
example.note: It's because of "the aid of" that args1 and 2 can be merged. Lower numbers always win!

example.name: all args
example.text: Rep. Dingell even managed *trace* to enlist the services of the Secret Service in his investigation of the Baltimore paper.
example.arg: the services of the Secret Service
his investigation of the Baltimore paper

example.name: unstated action
example.text: Mr. Maynard, whose company at the time was based in Santa Ana, Calif., enlisted his local congressman, and the battle was joined.
example.arg: Mr. Maynard, whose company at the time was based in Santa Ana, Calif.,

roleset.note: The analysis is "John enlisted himself in the Army."
